resources.string: Image of Jess with flowers and umbrella.
Jess is a recharge by hiking, cooking, sewing, or watching cartoons sort of dev.

Merry, a non-binary developer who seeks challenges and adventure wherever they go. Driven by whimsy, they delight in creating the absurd and surround themselves with the surreal. Merry makes their home amongst art and cats in Seattle, WA and is eager for the next chance they get to bring a little more magic into the world.
Nicole, with a cat on her head.

Nicole is a brand new Java dev. She loves working on the back-end and building out the perfect android app. Outside of dev work, you can catch her playing with any animal within arms reach, at the archery range, or re-playing one of the Zelda games.
- Illinois native - Software Developer - Project & Operations Management - University of Washington & Citadel Graduate - Army Veteran
Java developer with a focus on back end development and tools. Gew up on the East Coast. Background in formal CS, came to Code Fellows to finish out skill set.
